GPUPipelineError.summary: The GPUPipelineError interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} describes a pipeline failure. This is the value received when a {{jsxref("Promise")}} returned by a or call rejects.

remarks.para:
-The WebGPU API
-WebGPU Error Handling best practices

GPUPipelineErrorReason.summary:
The reason read-only property of the
interface defines the reason the pipeline creation failed in a machine-readable way.
GPUPipelineErrorReason.value: An enumerated value that can be one of:

GPUPipelineErrorGPUPipelineError.summary:
The GPUPipelineError() constructor creates a new
object instance.

remarks.para:
-The WebGPU API
-WebGPU Error Handling best practices
